abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals defeat New York Islanders, 3-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Evgeny Kuznetsov scored the lone goal in a shootout, Braden Holtby had 30 saves and Washington earned its fourth straight victory.

headline.main: Capitals Defeat the Islanders in a Shootout
headline.print_headline: Capitals Defeat the Islanders in a Shootout

snippet: Evgeny Kuznetsov scored the lone goal in a shootout, Braden Holtby had 30 saves and Washington earned its fourth straight victory.
